animeDescription: Anime adaptation of the same name horror manga by Suzumiya Wayu, serialized in Shogakuan's Weekly Shonen Sunday special issue.
animeStaff: [['Suzumiya Wayu', ['Director', 'Theme Song Lyrics', 'Theme Song Performance', 'Screenplay', 'Original Creator']], ['Wada Kaoru', ['Music']], ['Yamaguchi Toshikazu', ['Art Director']]]
